Hetu-ārammaṇa
Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Sahetukaduka
Ahetukapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
5.
942Akusalaṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
943Abyākataṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
944Akusalaṃ ahetukañca abyākataṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
945Abyākataṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
6.
946Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
